text: is a Japanese politician and the governor of Okayama Prefecture in Japan.Biography of Ryuta Ibaragi, Okayama Prefecture Website (Governor's Corner), May 22, 2015. Ibaragi assumed office as Okayama Prefectural Governor in November 2012. == References == Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:People from Okayama Prefecture Category:University of Tokyo alumni Category:Governors of Okayama Prefecture
title: Ryuta Ibaragi
